Змінити мову тут

Monetize your videos with NFTs in a couple of clicks

Atheneum is a platform that lets a YouTuber have a stable income with NFTs without having to dive into the complicated Web 3.0 world

Discover more

Introduction to Atheneum

Atheneum is a marketplace-based platform that lets YouTubers easily sell custom or automatically-generated NFTs related to their videos. At the same time, the fans can simply purchase the NFTs to support the creator or to access additional content.

Follow us on social media:

Monetizing videos with NFTs

YouTubers often struggle to make income with their content, especially if they get demonetized. Atheneum lets the creators have a consistent revenue based on NFT technology. The platform creates, puts to the marketplace, and sells the NFTs all by itself so a YouTuber does minimum additional efforts.

How does Atheneum work?

Benefits for NFT holders

When you buy the NFTs, you not only support your favorite content creators but also gain access to some extras or you can be mentioned as a "Top fan" for this channel. The content that you access after buying the NFTs can be additional videos, books, links for some topics, and so on…

Additional features: videos, books, links for some topics…
